purpose: Enhance the resilience and reliability of AI agent workflows by providing durable execution and orchestration capabilities.
principle: Built on Go with a focus on durable execution patterns, offering SDKs for Python and JavaScript to facilitate integration and orchestration of AI workflows.
reusability: Offers SDKs for Python and JavaScript, making it easy to integrate with existing AI workflows and applications. Designed for composability and plug-and-play integration.
limitations: Currently in alpha status, which may imply potential instability and incomplete features. Limited documentation and community support may pose challenges.
name: orra
highlight: Provides resilience and reliability for AI agent workflows through durable execution and orchestration.
